name: Prison Information Management System
desc: Developed a web application to manage prisoner records, visit requests, room allocations, and user roles using Laravel, Blade, JavaScript, and MySQL.

name: Clearance Management System
desc: Built a system to digitize clearance processes for Bahir Dar University using Laravel and MySQL.

name: Campus Compass
desc: Created an Android app for campus navigation, helping users locate places like dormitories and classrooms.

name: Real Estate Management System
desc: Developed a platform for property listing and communication using Java Servlet and Java GUI.

name: Smart Home Embedded System
desc: Built a prototype to monitor temperature/humidity and control doors with RFID and sound detection.

name: Smart Stove Project certificate
desc: Designed a mobile-controlled cooking system, awarded in a 2010 school innovation competition.
